EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-VoLTE-Email-Technical nurture-T0022J.Email 1 - API Use Case
EmailTemplate.subject: How to use VoLTE to deliver richer voice services
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> How to use VoLTE to deliver richer voice services Nokia Call Management Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) simplify the creation of new services by reducing development and integration time. Built into Nokia Telecom Application Server (TAS), APIs enable artificial intelligence, big data analytics, speech recognition and other technologies to be used to create richer voice-based services. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
